concept_data.title: European Productivity Agency
concept_data.preferred_term: European Association of National Productivity Centres

summary: The "European Productivity Agency" is a redirect term for the "European Association of National Productivity Centres," which operates within the framework of EU organizations aimed at enhancing productivity across member states. This agency facilitates collaboration among national productivity centres, promoting best practices and innovative methodologies to improve economic efficiency. In the context of EU legal and regulatory documents, it plays a crucial role in shaping policies that foster competitiveness and sustainable growth. By aligning national efforts with EU objectives, the agency contributes to the overarching goal of enhancing productivity as a key driver of economic prosperity within the European Union.
